about_the_game:
You'll be challenged to survive in a world that's turned against you. Every day is a test of survival as you scavenge for resources, hunt for food, and seek out shelter.

An open world map at your disposal to create your story. In Dead Beyond there are no quests, no pre-defined gaming paths, you decide your journey to survive. Whether you're scavenging for food, crafting essential survival tools, or defending against hostile creatures, every moment, every decision, is crucial to staying alive.

Loot and store materials, food, medicine, electronics and weaponary gears based on realistic mechanics. Gather resources to craft tools, weapons, and other items that will aid in your survival. Prepare yourself for the dark nights and stormy days with a season-inspired day/night cycle.

Before resting and finding shelter in one of the abandoned houses, tents or bunkers on the map, make sure to clear it out of zombies and hostile creatures. You can also add fortifications and traps to keep out the undeads.

Your survival skills will be put to the ultimate test in this post-apocalyptic world.

short_description: Dead Beyond is a single-player survival FPS game set in a post-apocalyptic world. The aftermath of a global apocalypse has left the world in ruins, and you have to survive into a harsh, unforgiving landscape teeming with zombies and hostile creatures.
